data.persona: I am a gardener who loves harvesting tomatoes. I am in love with my friend Alice. I may someday get a job with the king.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard.
Hand carved stone surround the courtyard made by the most skilled masons with their impervious designs. Its large and quiet with hanging moss, and several beds of flowers.
There's a stone bench, a flowerpot, a Hand carved stone, a Flower, and a torch here.
The lord and the queen are here.

You are carrying a sheer and a vegetable., and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the flower to the queen
data.mid_motivation: I want the queen to notice my skill today
data.long_motivation: I hope to be employed to work in the palace gardens in the coming weeks
